greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Euler totient function of the arithmetic derivative of n: a(n) = phi(n'), a(1) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
mathematica: Array[EulerPhi@ If[Abs@ # < 2, 0, # Total[#2/#1 & @@@ FactorInteger[Abs@ #]]] &, 75] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Oct 30 2017, after _Michael Somos_ at A003415 *)
program: (PARI) rd(n) = {local(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1];));}
results.author: _Luca Brigada Villa_, Sep 24 2013
ext: Description/formula clarified and more terms added by _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 30 2017
